==Abyssal Moon Spire==
===Floor 11=== 
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
**All characters in the party gain a 60% {{Color|Electro DMG Bonus}}.
**All party members gain 30% [[Healing Bonus]].
*'''Additional Effects'''
**In Chamber 1's First Half, The Cryo Abyss Mage is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which spawns an Ice Cage every once in a while.
**In Chamber 1's Second Half, The Pyro Geovishap is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which inflicts characters with '''Smouldering Flames'''
**In Chamber 1's Second Half, The Electro Geovishap is empowered with a {{Electro}} Aura which spawns a Lightning Bolt Matrix every once in a while.
**In Chamber 2's Second Half, The Large Pyro Slime and Pyro Abyss Mage are empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which inflicts characters with '''Smouldering Flames'''.

===Floor 12=== 
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
**For this floor only, the ley line flow will be normal.
*'''Additional Effects'''
**In Chamber 3 Second Half, the Rimebiter and Bolteater Vishap are part of the [[Coral Defenders]] fight and are linked enemies as a replacement to the '''Critical Assist''' mechanic. The Bolteater's wall assist attack is also disabled for this fight.
**As Linked Enemies, When either of the Vishaps reaches 0HP, The other must be killed within 10s, or the Vishap will revive with 40% of its Health.
